Products

ProOffice

ProOffice can generate custom internal reports such as year end, council reports, or other reports you require.

ProInspector

ProInspector is designed to meet the specific requirements of the building department and their obligatory reporting to province.

view details

ProPermits

ProPermits is an online application portal for applicants to apply for and manage municipal permits and licenses.

view details

ProMaintenance

ProMaintenance is a workflow software that helps Public Works create and manage work orders.

view details

ProDevelopment

ProDevelopment lets municipalities leverage ProwareLabs software modules and experience to help integrate legacy systems.
